title.narrative: Strengthened institutional capacity of Government and NGO partners in C4D to plan, implement, and advocate evidence-based social and behaviour change communication

description.narrative: C4D approaches were integrated in key interventions across health, nutrition, WASH, Education, Child Protection and adolescents programming towards country programme results using evidence based social and behaviour change strategies. Social mobilization for planning and roll out of emergencies activities were conducted in collaboration with government, NGOs and Global Eradication Initiative Partners for polio outbreak | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
